title: Mastermind
description: A web site inviting game players to mastermind the perfect crime is more than a game, much more! It is the facade for billionaire Lawrence Hackett's real-life invitation-only competition to see who can perform the perfect heist. Only a select few are invited to play for the bounty at stake. Special agent Mitchell Parker and his Washington D.C. based team span the globe trying to prevent the real-life crimes before they happen! Washington, Paris, London ... the clock is on!
author: Helen Goltz
